meanings.definition: A metallic chemical element with the symbol Tb and atomic number 65.
meanings.sent1: Terbium is found in the periodic table.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study terbium to learn about its properties.
meanings.sent3: The curious terbium decided to explore the world of elements.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of elements, terbium shines brightly like a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming terbium caught the eye of the curious chemist.

meanings.definition: A terbium compound used in certain types of lasers.
meanings.sent1: The laser technician carefully handled the terbium compound.
meanings.sent2: Terbium is an essential component in laser technology.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous terbium compound made the laser beam dance.
meanings.sent4: The terbium compound lit up the room like a tiny star.
meanings.sent5: The powerful terbium compound fueled the laser's brilliance.

meanings.definition: A terbium oxide used in the production of electronic devices.
meanings.sent1: Manufacturers rely on terbium oxide for electronic gadgets.
meanings.sent2: Terbium oxide enhances the performance of electronic devices.
meanings.sent3: The playful terbium oxide sparked a surge in device production.
meanings.sent4: Like a conductor, terbium oxide orchestrates the harmony of electronics.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant terbium oxide breathed life into the electronic world.
